channel.title: disruption on CyberMiles News and Articles
channel.description: Recent content in disruption on CyberMiles News and Articles

item.title: Service Disruption Incident Postmortem
item.description: tl;dr If your CyberMiles node stopped at block height 1724747, please stop it (CTRL-C works), upgrade software to v0.1.8-beta-hotfix and restart. Or, you could also start from a snapshot or from genesis. If you are a validator node, please make sure that you backup your config files and use those config files when you restart. On May 26th 2019, the CyberMiles public blockchain suffered a technical failure that paused blockchain operation for 17 hours.

item.title: 服务中断事件回溯
item.description: tl;dr 如果你的 CyberMiles 节点停在了快高 1724747，请停止程序（CTRL-C），升级到软件版本 v0.1.8-beta-hotfix，然后重启。或者，你
